about_the_game:
Little Nemo meets The Clown in this new Adventure. He helps him to find the Mistery Tower and discover the secrets fields of Wizardrym.

Can you find The Clown on this mysterious and magical Journey to the Final Destination?
Rush throught the Space before the Time runs out.

This game is inspired by the Little Nemo original Winsor McCay comics stripes from 1900,s New York and the modern 80,s tale written by Gilles Villeneuve, The Clown.

Key Features


  • For fans of 2D Open World and Metroidvanias.
  • Maze Runner like game, explore, find and talk to secret Characters to acess secret Areas.
  • Multiple endings, cinematic, story driven and non linear.
  • More than 100 characters and 22 areas.
  • Short game, about 2 hours.
  • Not an Action Combat, but Puzzle Exploration focused.
  • Amazing graphics and sound.

Little Nemo The Clown is a 2D Open World game inspired on the very good Metroidvania genre titles.

Talk, Run, Fly, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Fantasy World full of Magic and Color.

Little Nemo The Clown is a modern Maze Runner Adventure.

Can you find the Clown before your Time runs out?
